## Leave no error behind  

1. Consistency
1. Transparency
1. Relevance
1. Exhaustiveness
1. Conciseness

Tools
- follow style guide
    - use consistent problem statements -> use "must" and "can't" phrases
- format with CLI
    - additional features, like rlang::abort 
    - uses `{glue}`
    - Action, What, and How
- use error bullets
- pass error calls and arguments
- use chained errors
